## Data Sync Checklist

If modifying data:

- [ ] `README.md` has been updated
- [ ] `api.json` has been updated
- [ ] Changes are consistent between both files
- [ ] `SOURCES.md` updated (if adding new references)
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated

## Source Verification

- [ ] Changes are supported by cited sources
- [ ] Sources are listed in `SOURCES.md`
- [ ] No unverified claims added as fact

## Quality Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/wyrdness/.github/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] Spelling and grammar checked
- [ ] Links are working
- [ ] JSON is valid (if applicable)
- [ ] No private/personal information included without consent
